name: Kootenay Lake Aviation
about: Kootenay Lake Aviation, based in Nelson, British Columbia, has been a leader in flight training and aviation services since 2010. Located at the Nelson Airport on the shores of Kootenay Lake, the school offers a range of programs including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). In addition to flight training, Kootenay Lake Aviation provides sightseeing tours and air charters, allowing passengers to enjoy the breathtaking landscape of the region. The school operates year-round and offers private charter flights to various destinations in BC and Alberta using their 3-passenger aircraft. With a focus on hands-on learning and scenic flights, Kootenay Lake Aviation is an ideal choice for both aspiring pilots and those seeking unique aerial experiences. Join us to explore the skies and enjoy the beauty of the Kootenay region from above.
